dcterms:description: In the multi-robot warehouse environment, agents need to collect and deliver requested items from shelves within warehouses, adapting their strategies based on varying layouts.
dcterms:title: Multi-Robot Warehouse (RWARE)

dcterms:creator: Igor Mordatch
Pieter Abbeel
dcterms:description: The multi-agent particle environment involves cooperative navigation tasks where agents must navigate to landmarks while avoiding collisions.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent Particle Environment (MPE)

dcterms:description: The Boulder-Push environment is a new environment where agents navigate a gridworld and push a box towards a goal location, requiring significant coordination.
dcterms:title: Boulder-Push (BPUSH)

dcterms:creator: Stefano V. Albrecht
Subramanian Ramamoorthy
Stefano V Albrecht
Peter Stone
dcterms:description: In the level-based foraging environment, multiple agents coordinate to pick up food items based on their levels, requiring cooperation.
dcterms:title: Level-Based Foraging (LBF)
